001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Random;
007
008import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateMatrixFunction;
009import org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.MultivariateVectorFunction;
010import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
011import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
016import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
017
018import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.util.MathUtil;
019import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
020import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
021import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Pnt2d.PntDouble;
022import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping2D;

024/**
025 * This class defines methods for estimating the homography (projective)
026 * transformation between pairs of 2D point sets.
027 * 
028 * TODO: See 'homography' package in Computer Vision 2020 course materials 
029 * for the latest version!
030 * 
031 * 
032 * @author WB
033 * @deprecated
034 */
035public class HomographyEstimator2 {
036        
037        private static int MaxLmEvaluations = 1000;
038        private static int MaxLmIterations = 1000;
039        
040        private final boolean normalizePointCoordinates;
041        private final boolean doNonlinearRefinement;
042        
043        // ------------------------------------------------------------
044        
045        public HomographyEstimator2() {
046                this(true, true);
047        }
048        
049        public HomographyEstimator2(boolean normalizePointCoordinates, boolean doNonlinearRefinement) {
050                this.normalizePointCoordinates = normalizePointCoordinates;
051                this.doNonlinearRefinement = doNonlinearRefinement;
052        }
053        
054        // ------------------------------------------------------------
055        
056        /**
057         * Estimates the homography (projective) transformation from two given 2D point sets.
058         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
059         * @param ptsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
060         * @param ptsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
061         * @return the estimated homography (3 x 3 matrix)
062         */
063        public RealMatrix estimateHomography(Point2D[] ptsA, Point2D[] ptsB) {
064                int n = ptsA.length;
065                
066                RealMatrix Id = MatrixUtils.createRealIdentityMatrix(3);
067                RealMatrix Na = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsA) : Id;
068                RealMatrix Nb = (normalizePointCoordinates) ? getNormalisationMatrix(ptsB) : Id;        
069                RealMatrix M = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(n * 2, 9);
070
071                for (int j = 0, r = 0; j < ptsA.length; j++) {
072                        final double[] pA = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsA[j]), Na);
073                        final double[] pB = transform(MathUtil.toArray(ptsB[j]), Nb);
074                        final double xA = pA[0];
075                        final double yA = pA[1];
076                        final double xB = pB[0];
077                        final double yB = pB[1];                        
078                        M.setRow(r + 0, new double[] {xA, yA, 1, 0, 0, 0, -(xA * xB), -(yA * xB), -(xB)});
079                        M.setRow(r + 1, new double[] {0, 0, 0, xA, yA, 1, -(xA * yB), -(yA * yB), -(yB)});
080                        r = r + 2;
081                }
082
083                // find h, such that M . h = 0:
084                double[] h = MathUtil.solveHomogeneousSystem(M).toArray();
085                
086                // assemble homography matrix H from h:
087                RealMatrix H = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] 
088                                {{h[0], h[1], h[2]},
089                                 {h[3], h[4], h[5]},
090                                 {h[6], h[7], h[8]}} );
091
092                // de-normalize the homography
093                if (normalizePointCoordinates) {
094                        H = MatrixUtils.inverse(Nb).multiply(H).multiply(Na);
095                }
096                
097                // rescale M such that H[2][2] = 1 (unless H[2][2] close to 0)
098                if (Math.abs(H.getEntry(2, 2)) > 10e-8) {
099                        H = H.scalarMultiply(1.0 / H.getEntry(2, 2));
100                }
101                else {
102                        throw new RuntimeException("estimateHomography(): H could not be normalized");
103                }
104                
105                return doNonlinearRefinement ? refineHomography(H, ptsA, ptsB) : H;
106        }
107        
108        /**
109         * Estimates the homographies between a fixed set of 2D model points and
110         * multiple observations (image point sets).
111         * The correspondence between the points is assumed to be known.
112         * TODO: This should not be here.
113         * @param modelPts a sequence of 2D points on the model (calibration target)
114         * @param obsPoints a sequence 2D image point sets (one set per view).
115         * @return the sequence of estimated homographies (3 x 3 matrices), one for each view
116         * @deprecated
117         */
118        public RealMatrix[] estimateHomographies(Point2D[] modelPts, Point2D[][] obsPoints) {
119                final int M = obsPoints.length;
120                RealMatrix[] homographies = new RealMatrix[M];
121                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
122                        homographies[i] = estimateHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
123//                      RealMatrix Hinit = estimateHomography(modelPts, obsPoints[i]);
124//                      RealMatrix H = doNonlinearRefinement ?
125//                                      refineHomography(Hinit, modelPts, obsPoints[i]) : Hinit;
126//                      homographies[i] = H;
127                }
128                return homographies;
129        }
130        
131
132        
133
134        /**
135         * Refines the initial homography by non-linear (Levenberg-Marquart) optimization.
136         * @param Hinit the initial (estimated) homography matrix
137         * @param pntsA the 1st sequence of 2D points 
138         * @param pntsB the 2nd sequence of 2D points
139         * @return the refined homography matrix
140         */
141        public static RealMatrix refineHomography(RealMatrix Hinit, Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
142                final int M = pntsA.length;             
143                double[] observed = new double[2 * M];
144                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
145                        observed[i * 2 + 0] = pntsB[i].getX();
146                        observed[i * 2 + 1] = pntsB[i].getY();
147                }                       
148                MultivariateVectorFunction value = getValueFunction(pntsA);
149                MultivariateMatrixFunction jacobian = getJacobianFunction(pntsA);
150                
151                LeastSquaresProblem problem = LeastSquaresFactory.create(
152                                LeastSquaresFactory.model(value, jacobian),
153                                MatrixUtils.createRealVector(observed), 
154                                MathUtil.getRowPackedVector(Hinit), 
155                                null,  // ConvergenceChecker
156                                MaxLmEvaluations, 
157                                MaxLmIterations);
158                
159                LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer lm = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();
160                Optimum result = lm.optimize(problem);
161                
162                RealVector optimum = result.getPoint();
163                RealMatrix Hopt = MathUtil.fromRowPackedVector(optimum, 3, 3);
164                int iterations = result.getIterations();
165                if (iterations >= MaxLmIterations) {
166                        throw new RuntimeException("refineHomography(): max. number of iterations exceeded");
167                }
168                //System.out.println("LM optimizer iterations " + iterations);
169                return Hopt.scalarMultiply(1.0 / Hopt.getEntry(2, 2));
170        }
171        
172        
173        private static MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction(Point2D[] X) {
174                //System.out.println("MultivariateVectorFunction getValueFunction");
175                return new MultivariateVectorFunction() {
176                        public double[] value(double[] h) {                     
177                                final double[] Y = new double[X.length * 2];
178                                for (int j = 0; j < X.length; j++) {
179                                        final double x = X[j].getX();
180                                        final double y = X[j].getY();
181                                        final double w = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
182                                        Y[j * 2 + 0] = (h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2]) / w;
183                                        Y[j * 2 + 1] = (h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5]) / w;
184                                }
185                                return Y;
186                        }
187                };
188        }
189        
190        protected static MultivariateMatrixFunction getJacobianFunction(Point2D[] X) {
191                return new MultivariateMatrixFunction() {
192                        public double[][] value(double[] h) {
193                                final double[][] J = new double[2 * X.length][];
194                                for (int i = 0; i < X.length; i++) {
195                                        final double x = X[i].getX();
196                                        final double y = X[i].getY();
197                                        
198                                        final double w  = h[6] * x + h[7] * y + h[8];
199                                        final double w2 = w * w;
200                                        
201                                        final double sx = h[0] * x + h[1] * y + h[2];           
202                                        J[2 * i + 0] = new double[] {x/w, y/w, 1/w, 0, 0, 0, -sx*x/w2, -sx*y/w2, -sx/w2};
203                                        
204                                        final double sy = h[3] * x + h[4] * y + h[5];
205                                        J[2 * i + 1] = new double[] {0, 0, 0, x/w, y/w, 1/w, -sy*x/w2, -sy*y/w2, -sy/w2};
206                                }
207                                return J;
208                        }
209                };
210        }
211

303        
304        
305        private static double[] transform(double[] p, RealMatrix M3x3) {
306                if (p.length != 2) {
307                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("transform(): vector p must be of length 2 but is " + p.length);
308                }
309                double[] pA = MathUtil.toHomogeneous(p);
310                double[] pAt = M3x3.operate(pA);
311                return MathUtil.toCartesian(pAt); // need to de-homogenize, since pAt[2] == 1?
312        }
313        
314        private RealMatrix getNormalisationMatrix(Point2D[] pnts) {
315                final int N = pnts.length;
316                double[] x = new double[N];
317                double[] y = new double[N];
318                
319                for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
320                        x[i] = pnts[i].getX();
321                        y[i] = pnts[i].getY();
322                }
323                
324                // calculate the means in x/y
325                double meanx = MathUtil.mean(x);
326                double meany = MathUtil.mean(y);
327
328                // calculate the variances in x/y
329                double varx = MathUtil.variance(x);
330                double vary = MathUtil.variance(y);
331                
332                double sx = Math.sqrt(2 / varx);
333                double sy = Math.sqrt(2 / vary);
334
335                RealMatrix matrixA = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] {
336                                { sx,  0, -sx * meanx},
337                                {  0, sy, -sy * meany},
338                                {  0,  0,           1 }});
339                
340                return matrixA;
341        }
342        
343
344        // TESTING --------------------------------------------------------
345        
346        static double NOISE = 0.1;
347        
348        private static Point2D mapPoint(RealMatrix H, Point2D p) {
349                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
350                double[] xb = transform(xa, H);
351                return new Point2D.Double(xb[0], xb[1]);
352        }
353        
354        static Random rand = new Random();
355        
356        private static Point2D mapPointWithNoise(RealMatrix H, Point2D p, double noise) {
357                double[] xa = {p.getX(), p.getY()};
358                double[] xb = transform(xa, H);
359                double xn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
360                double yn = noise * rand.nextGaussian();
361                return new Point2D.Double(xb[0] + xn, xb[1] + yn);
362        }
363        
364        /**
365         * Used for testing only.
366         * @param args ignored
367         */
368        public static void main(String[] args) {
369                RealMatrix Hreal = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
370                                {{3, 2, -1},
371                                {5, 0, 2},
372                                {4, 4, 9}});
373
374                System.out.println("H (real) = ");
375                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.scalarMultiply(1/Hreal.getEntry(2, 2)).getData()));
376//              System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hreal.getData()));
377                
378                List<Point2D> pntlistA = new ArrayList<Point2D>();
379                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(10, 7));
380                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(3, -1));
381                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(5, 5));
382                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(-6, 13));
383                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(0, 1));
384                pntlistA.add(new Point2D.Double(2, 3));
385                
386                List<Point2D> pntlistB = new ArrayList<Point2D>();
387                for (Point2D a : pntlistA) {
388                        pntlistB.add(mapPointWithNoise(Hreal, a, NOISE));
389                }
390                
391                Point2D[] pntsA = pntlistA.toArray(new Point2D[0]);
392                Point2D[] pntsB = pntlistB.toArray(new Point2D[0]);
393                
394                
395                System.out.println("\nPoint correspondences:");
396                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
397                        Point2D a = pntsA[i];
398                        Point2D b = pntsB[i];
399                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f)\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), b.getX(), b.getY());
400                }
401                System.out.println();
402                
403                System.out.println("\n*************** WITHOUT NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
404                runTest(new HomographyEstimator2(true, false), pntsA, pntsB);
405                
406                System.out.println("\n*************** WITH NONLINEAR REFINEMENT *****************");
407                runTest(new HomographyEstimator2(true, true), pntsA, pntsB);
408                
409                System.out.println("\n*************** FROM PROJECTIVE MAPPING *****************");
410                runTestMapping(pntsA, pntsB);
411        
412        }
413        
414        static void runTest(HomographyEstimator2 he, Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
415                RealMatrix Hest = he.estimateHomography(pntsA, pntsB);
416                
417                System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
418                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
419                
420                Point2D[] pntsC = new Point2D[pntsA.length];
421                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
422                        pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
423                }
424                
425                System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
426                double sumDist2 = 0;
427                double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
428                for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
429                        Point2D a = pntsA[i];
430                        Point2D b = pntsB[i];
431                        Point2D c = pntsC[i];
432                        double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
433                        sumDist2 += dist2;
434                        maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
435                        System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
436                }
437                System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
438                System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
439        }
440        
441        static void runTestMapping(Point2D[] pntsA, Point2D[] pntsB) {
442                ProjectiveMapping2D mapping = 
443                                ProjectiveMapping2D.fromPoints(toPointArray(pntsA), toPointArray(pntsB));
444                double[][] Hmap = mapping.getTransformationMatrix();
445                System.out.println("H (mapping) = "); 
446                System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hmap));
447                        {
448                        Point2D[] pntsC = new Point2D[pntsA.length];
449                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
450                                //pntsC[i] = (Point2D) mapping.applyTo(Point.create(pntsA[i]));
451                                pntsC[i] = mapping.applyTo(PntDouble.from(pntsA[i])).toAwtPoint2D();
452                        }
453                
454                        System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
455                        double sumDist2 = 0;
456                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
457                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
458                                Point2D a = pntsA[i];
459                                Point2D b = pntsB[i];
460                                Point2D c = pntsC[i];
461                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
462                                sumDist2 += dist2;
463                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
464                                System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
465                        }
466                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
467                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));
468                }
469                {
470                        System.out.println("   +++ running refinement ++++");
471                        RealMatrix Hinit = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Hmap);
472                        RealMatrix Hest = refineHomography(Hinit, pntsA, pntsB);
473                        System.out.println("H (estim.) = "); 
474                        System.out.println(Matrix.toString(Hest.getData()));
475                        
476                        Point2D[] pntsC = new Point2D[pntsA.length];
477                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {        
478                                pntsC[i] = mapPoint(Hest, pntsA[i]);
479                        }
480                        
481//                      System.out.println("\nPoints mapped:");
482                        double sumDist2 = 0;
483                        double maxDist2 = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
484                        for (int i = 0; i < pntsA.length; i++) {
485                                Point2D a = pntsA[i];
486                                Point2D b = pntsB[i];
487                                Point2D c = pntsC[i];
488                                double dist2 = b.distanceSq(c);
489                                sumDist2 += dist2;
490                                maxDist2 = Math.max(maxDist2, dist2);
491//                              System.out.format("(%.3f, %.3f) -> (%.3f, %.3f) d=%.4f\n", a.getX(), a.getY(), c.getX(), c.getY(), dist2);
492                        }
493                        System.out.format("\nTotal error = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(sumDist2));
494                        System.out.format("Max. dist = %.2f\n", Math.sqrt(maxDist2));   
495                }
496        }
497        
498        static Pnt2d[] toPointArray(Point2D[] pts2D) {
499                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[pts2D.length];
500                for (int i = 0; i < pts2D.length; i++) {
501                        pts[i] = PntDouble.from(pts2D[i]);
502                }
503                return pts;
504        }
505
506}
